exercise.title: Malicious Traffic Analysis - Part 1
exercise.name: mnta_p1
exercise.shortdescription: Analyze network traffic of an infected computer.
exercise.description: You're working as an analyst at your organization's Security Operations Center (SOC). One of the other analysts was investigating alerts on a Windows host, and the computer is infected. That analyst retrieved a pcap of network traffic from the associated IP address.
exercise.tutorial:
On your defensive workstation, open the malicious_traffic_p1.pcap in the pcap folder. Traffic Analysis tools are available in the share drive.

Analyze the pcap and answer the questions below.

question.text: What is the post-infection traffic generated by the infected computer (in the pcap)?
What is the redirect URL generated by the compromised website that leads to the exploit kit?
What is the exploit kit IP address?
What is the exploit kit domain?
